body_html: To further clarify, I agree with the points @martinwicke and @gunan made about CUDA being responsible for how much Ubuntu 14.04 support we can offer. I'm just hoping that doesn't rule out the possibility of TensorFlow CPU continuing to support Ubuntu 14.04.
body_text: To further clarify, I agree with the points @martinwicke and @gunan made about CUDA being responsible for how much Ubuntu 14.04 support we can offer. I'm just hoping that doesn't rule out the possibility of TensorFlow CPU continuing to support Ubuntu 14.04.
body: To further clarify, I agree with the points @martinwicke and @gunan made about CUDA being responsible for how much Ubuntu 14.04 support we can offer. I'm just hoping that doesn't rule out the possibility of TensorFlow CPU continuing to support Ubuntu 14.04.
